  • All Classes

Package org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineImageViewer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImageLoader
    An ImageLoader can accept a DataInputStream to an Hadoop FSImage file and walk over its structure using the supplied ImageVisitor.
    PBImageTextWriter.MetadataMap
    This metadata map is used to construct the namespace before generating text outputs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelimitedImageVisitor
    A DelimitedImageVisitor generates a text representation of the fsimage, with each element separated by a delimiter string.
    DepthCounter
    Utility class for tracking descent into the structure of the Visitor class (ImageVisitor, EditsVisitor etc.)
    FileDistributionCalculator
    This is the tool for analyzing file sizes in the namespace image.
    FileDistributionVisitor
    File size distribution visitor.
    FileDistributionVisitor.FileContext
    File or directory information.
    FSImageHandler
    Implement the read-only WebHDFS API for fsimage.
    FSImageLoader
    FSImageLoader loads fsimage and provide methods to return JSON formatted file status of the namespace of the fsimage.
    ImageLoader.LoaderFactory
    Factory for obtaining version of image loader that can read a particular image format.
    ImageLoaderCurrent
    ImageLoaderCurrent processes Hadoop FSImage files and walks over them using a provided ImageVisitor, calling the visitor at each element enumerated below.
    ImageVisitor
    An implementation of ImageVisitor can traverse the structure of an Hadoop fsimage and respond to each of the structures within the file.
    IndentedImageVisitor
    IndentedImageVisitor walks over an FSImage and displays its structure using indenting to organize sections within the image file.
    LsImageVisitor
    LsImageVisitor displays the blocks of the namespace in a format very similar to the output of ls/lsr.
    NameDistributionVisitor
    File name distribution visitor.
    OfflineImageViewer
    OfflineImageViewer to dump the contents of an Hadoop image file to XML or the console.
    OfflineImageViewerPB
    OfflineImageViewerPB to dump the contents of an Hadoop image file to XML or the console.
    PBImageDelimitedTextWriter
    A PBImageDelimitedTextWriter generates a text representation of the PB fsimage, with each element separated by a delimiter string.
    PBImageTextWriter
    This class reads the protobuf-based fsimage and generates text output for each inode to PBImageTextWriter.out.
    PBImageTextWriter.InMemoryMetadataDB
    Maintain all the metadata in memory.
    PBImageTextWriter.InMemoryMetadataDB.Dir
    Represent a directory in memory.
    PBImageTextWriter.LevelDBMetadataMap
    A MetadataMap that stores metadata in LevelDB.
    PBImageTextWriter.LevelDBMetadataMap.DirPathCache
    A LRU cache for directory path strings.
    PBImageTextWriter.LevelDBMetadataMap.LevelDBStore
    Store metadata in LevelDB.
    PBImageXmlWriter
    PBImageXmlWriter walks over an fsimage structure and writes out an equivalent XML document that contains the fsimage's components.
    TextWriterImageVisitor
    TextWriterImageProcessor mixes in the ability for ImageVisitor implementations to easily write their output to a text file.
    WebImageViewer
    WebImageViewer loads a fsimage and exposes read-only WebHDFS API for its namespace.
    XmlImageVisitor
    An XmlImageVisitor walks over an fsimage structure and writes out an equivalent XML document that contains the fsimage's components.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageVisitor.ImageElement
    Structural elements of an FSImage that may be encountered within the file.
